title: 34 Ping, 60 FPS, still lag in game.
body: It's probably packet loss, but ever since this patch, I will randomly freeze and all minions will not have health bars and be attacking and then everything will stop, then jump through space and time to the live match everyone else sees. It makes it really difficult to play sometimes. Idk why it's happening but if anyone's got a hot fix that'd be great. Thanks.

replies.body:
For packet loss, I'd suggest hard resetting your modem and router by unplugging them for 5 minutes. If it's packet loss you're getting and it doesn't go away, you may need to contact your ISP for help.

Please follow the steps (if there are any you haven't completed) on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your connection is set up properly.

If those steps don't help, you can view your connection by running a traceroute, and sharing the results might show us where it's going wrong. I suggest downloading the [WinMTR Network Diagnostic Tool](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/), then use that to run a traceroute to the following IP's (allow this to run for 5-15 minutes);

> 104.160.131.1

Export the results to a text file and paste them here.

It looks like you're having occasional spikes, but they start at your end. Make sure you don't have any updates or other downloads going on in the background, including on other devices on your network. If nothing intentional is causing this, I suggest contacting your ISP and let them know you're having these spikes.

I just wanted to re-iterate Deep Terror Nami's post here.  Packet Loss can be incredibly tricky to diagnose the root cause of, and it's incredibly important to make sure you complete all of the steps in the [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  The steps there are the most common solutions to getting your connection stable and consistent.

Feel free to reach out again if you are still getting these issues!

Hey, my issues only gotten worse recently. I'm kinda just replying to you to bump this issue so I can get some answers. I posted my results above from my packet loss test I did. Some help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks again.
I had my connection checked earlier today and now it's all fine and I'm having the same issue as OP. I can randomly go from 180 FPS to 65 and everything stops moving except for the health bars.
